remarks:
Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.) 

---

 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbval.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbval.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbval.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbval $p |- ( A. x ph <-> A. y ps ) $.
